news_insight_text_link.news_insight_description: Heimdal Security has highlighted the rise in sophisticated phishing campaigns driven by the rapid adoption of Generative AI technologies. Additionally, the company has joined the Internet Watch Foundation (IWF), marking a significant step in its commitment to cybersecurity.

org_similarity_summary.insight_similar_orgs: Heimdal Security, onShore Security, Surfshark, Smarttech247, Silversky, and Defy Security are all involved in the cybersecurity industry. onShore Security, Smarttech247, and Defy Security offer managed cybersecurity services, while Surfshark focuses on humanized privacy & security solutions. Silversky and Heimdal Security provide cloud-based cybersecurity solutions.

acquisition_identifier.value: Heimdal Security acquired by Marlin Equity Partners

overview_description.description:
Heimdal™ Security is a fast-growing cybersecurity company focused on continuous technological innovation. Since its establishment in 2014 in Copenhagen, based on the winning idea of CTF World Champions, Heimdal™ has experienced spectacular growth by proactively building products that anticipate threatscape trends.

The company offers a multi-layered security suite that combines threat prevention, patch and asset management, endpoint rights management, and antivirus and mail security which together secure customers against cyberattacks and keep critical information and intellectual property safe. Heimdal™ has been recognized as a thought leader in the industry and has won multiple international awards both for its solutions and for its educational content creation.

Currently, Heimdal™’s cybersecurity solutions are deployed in more than 45 countries and supported regionally from offices in 15+ countries, by 175+ highly qualified specialists. Heimdal™ is ISAE 3000 certified and secures more than 2 million endpoints for over 10,000 companies. The company supports its partners without concessions on the basis of predictability and scalability. The common goal is to create a sustainable ecosystem and a strategic partnership.

properties.growth_insight_description: Heimdal Security may be growing as evidenced by the launch of Partner NEXUS, a unified and global partner program aimed at fostering collective success. This initiative suggests an expansion of their business operations and a strategic move to strengthen their market position through partnerships. Additionally, the company's engagement in the discourse on AI safety standards indicates an active role in the cybersecurity community, which may contribute to its reputation and influence in the industry.

about_short_description.short_description: Heimdal Security is a provider of cloud-based cybersecurity solutions.

product.name: Heimdal XDR Unified Security Platform
product.description: A platform offering comprehensive protection against cyber threats, integrating various security technologies for endpoints, networks, and emails.

product.name: DNS Security - Network
product.description: Protects networks and data with AI/ML-powered intelligence, filtering DNS, HTTP, and HTTPS traffic to identify and mitigate threats.

product.name: Patch & Asset Management
product.description: Automates the deployment of patches across multiple platforms, ensuring systems are up-to-date and compliant with industry regulations.

product.name: Email Security
product.description: Defends against sophisticated email phishing and fraud attacks, utilizing advanced detection techniques.

product.name: Threat Hunting
product.description: Identifies and neutralizes advanced persistent threats and adversaries, providing tools for deep investigation and response.

product.name: Privileged Access Management
product.description: Manages and secures privileged access to systems, ensuring compliance and minimizing the risk of unauthorized access.
